mapper.select: SELECT A.CONTENTS_NM ,A.CONTENTS_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A

SELECT A.CONTENTS_NM ,A.CONTENTS_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A ORDER BY CONTENTS_ID DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT A.CONTENTS_NM ,A.CONTENTS_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A LIMIT #{startNo}, #{perPage}

SELECT A.CONTENTS_NM ,A.CONTENTS_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A WHERE A.CONTENTS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT A.CONTENTS_NM ,A.CONTENTS_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT , A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID , A.BRAND_ID ,(SELECT CONTENTS_SERIES_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS_SERIES WHERE CONTENTS_SERIES_ID = A.CONTENTS_SERIES_ID) AS SERIES_NM ,(SELECT BRAND_NM FROM BG_BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM FROM BG_CONTENTS A WHERE CONTENTS_ID = #{contents_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT BG_CONTENTS( CONTENTS_NM, CONTENTS_SERIES_ID, BRAND_ID, SRC_PATH, MOD_DT ) VALUES( #{contents_nm}, #{contents_series_id}, #{brand_id}, #{src_path}, now() )
